verses.verse: If <S%G1487><s%> you then <S%G3767><s%> be risen <S%G4891><s%> with Christ, <S%G5547><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things which are above, <S%G507><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> sits <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> hand of God. <S%G2316><s%>
Set <S%G5426><s%> your affection <S%G5426><s%> on things above, <S%G507><s%> not on <S%G1909><s%> things on the earth. <S%G1093><s%>
For you are dead, <S%G599><s%> and your <S%G5216><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> is hid <S%G2928><s%> with Christ <S%G5547><s%> in God. <S%G2316><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who is our life, <S%G2222><s%> shall appear, <S%G5319><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall you also <S%G2532><s%> appear <S%G5319><s%> with him in glory. <S%G1391><s%>

Mortify <S%G3499><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are on the earth; <S%G1093><s%> fornication, <S%G4202><s%> uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> inordinate <S%G3806><s%> affection, <S%G3806><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> concupiscence, <S%G1939><s%> and covetousness, <S%G4124><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is idolatry: <S%G1495><s%>
For which <S%G3739><s%> things' sake the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of disobedience: <S%G543><s%>
In the which <S%G3739><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> walked <S%G4043><s%> some <S%G4218><s%> time, <S%G4218><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> you lived <S%G2198><s%> in them.

But now <S%G3570><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G659><s%> off <S%G659><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these; anger, <S%G3709><s%> wrath, <S%G2372><s%> malice, <S%G2549><s%> blasphemy, <S%G988><s%> filthy <S%G148><s%> communication <S%G148><s%> out of your <S%G5216><s%> mouth. <S%G4750><s%>
Lie <S%G5574><s%> not one <S%G240><s%> to another, <S%G240><s%> seeing that you have put <S%G554><s%> off <S%G554><s%> the old <S%G3820><s%> man <S%G444><s%> with his deeds; <S%G4234><s%>

And have put <S%G1746><s%> on <S%G1746><s%> the new <S%G3501><s%> man, which <S%G3588><s%> is renewed <S%G341><s%> in knowledge <S%G1922><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the image <S%G1504><s%> of him that created <S%G2936><s%> him:

Where <S%G3699><s%> there is neither <S%G3756><s%> Greek <S%G1672><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> Jew, <S%G2453><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> uncircumcision, <S%G203><s%> Barbarian, <S%G915><s%> Scythian, <S%G4658><s%> bond <S%G1401><s%> nor free: <S%G1658><s%> but Christ <S%G5547><s%> is all, <S%G3956><s%> and in all. <S%G3956><s%>

Put <S%G1746><s%> on <S%G1746><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> as the elect <S%G1588><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and beloved, <S%G25><s%> bowels <S%G4698><s%> of mercies, <S%G3628><s%> kindness, <S%G5544><s%> humbleness <S%G5012><s%> of mind, meekness, <S%G4236><s%> long-suffering; <S%G3115><s%>

Forbearing <S%G430><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> and forgiving <S%G5483><s%> one <S%G1438><s%> another, <S%G1438><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man have <S%G2192><s%> a quarrel <S%G3437><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> any: <S%G5100><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> forgave you, so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> do you.
And above <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5125><s%> things put on charity, <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is the bond <S%G4886><s%> of perfection. <S%G5047><s%>

And let the peace <S%G1515><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> rule <S%G1018><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> to the which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> you are called <S%G2564><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> body; <S%G4983><s%> and be you thankful. <S%G2170><s%>

Let the word <S%G3056><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> dwell <S%G1774><s%> in you richly <S%G4146><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom; <S%G4678><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> and admonishing <S%G3560><s%> one <S%G1438><s%> another <S%G1438><s%> in psalms <S%G5568><s%> and hymns <S%G5215><s%> and spiritual <S%G4152><s%> songs, <S%G5603><s%> singing <S%G103><s%> with grace <S%G5485><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And whatever <S%G3956><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> in word <S%G3056><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> deed, <S%G2041><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> giving thanks <S%G2168><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and the Father <S%G3962><s%> by him.
Wives, <S%G1135><s%> submit <S%G5293><s%> yourselves to your <S%G2398><s%> own <S%G2398><s%> husbands, <S%G435><s%> as it is fit <S%G433><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Husbands, <S%G435><s%> love <S%G25><s%> your <S%G3588><s%> wives, <S%G1135><s%> and be not bitter <S%G4087><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> them.
Children, <S%G5043><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> your <S%G3588><s%> parents <S%G1118><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things: for this <S%G5124><s%> is well <S%G2101><s%> pleasing to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Fathers, <S%G3962><s%> provoke <S%G2042><s%> not your <S%G5216><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> to anger, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they be discouraged. <S%G120><s%>

Servants, <S%G1401><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things your <S%G3588><s%> masters <S%G2962><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh; <S%G4561><s%> not with eye-service, <S%G3787><s%> as men pleasers; <S%G441><s%> but in singleness <S%G572><s%> of heart, <S%G2588><s%> fearing <S%G5399><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>
And whatever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3748><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you do, <S%G4160><s%> do <S%G2038><s%> it heartily, <S%G1537><s%> <S%G5590><s%> as to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and not to men; <S%G444><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> you shall receive <S%G618><s%> the reward <S%G469><s%> of the inheritance: <S%G2817><s%> for you serve <S%G1398><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But he that does <S%G91><s%> wrong <S%G91><s%> shall receive <S%G2865><s%> for the wrong <S%G91><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has done: <S%G91><s%> and there is no <S%G3756><s%> respect <S%G4382><s%> of persons. <S%G4382><s%>
